title: Update homepage with Clean Claim Intelligence and Knowledge Board information

requirements.summary: Add Clean Claim Intelligence section to homepage highlighting 10-layer validation system and revenue protection benefits
acceptanceCriteria: Clean Claim Intelligence section appears on homepage with visual prominence
Section includes reference to 10-layer validation intelligence
Section includes link or CTA to navigate to /clean-claim-intelligence page
Content emphasizes revenue cycle management and claim accuracy benefits

file_operations.description: Add a new CleanClaimIntelligenceSection component between the solutions cards section and metrics display. Include heading, description highlighting the 10-layer validation system, key benefits list (revenue protection, claim accuracy, denial prevention), and a prominent CTA button linking to /clean-claim-intelligence. Use the existing generated image asset frontend/public/assets/generated/claim-intelligence-hero.dim_1200x600.png. Follow the Royal Teal color scheme and maintain consistency with existing section styling.

requirements.summary: Add Knowledge Board section to homepage promoting hospital licensing and regulatory compliance resources
acceptanceCriteria: Knowledge Board section appears on homepage
Section references hospital licensing and regulatory compliance topics
Section includes CTA or link to navigate to /knowledge-board page
Visual design maintains consistency with existing homepage sections

file_operations.description: Add a new KnowledgeBoardSection component after the CleanClaimIntelligenceSection and before the metrics display. Include heading, description promoting hospital licensing and regulatory compliance resources, highlight key topics (NABH standards, state-specific requirements, compliance checklist), and a CTA button linking to /knowledge-board. Use the existing generated image asset frontend/public/assets/generated/hospital-licenses-hero.dim_1920x1080.png. Follow the established design patterns and Royal Teal color scheme.

requirements.summary: Ensure updated homepage sections integrate seamlessly with existing components and maintain all current functionality
acceptanceCriteria: All existing homepage sections remain functional
New sections follow the established Royal Teal color scheme and design patterns
Page layout remains responsive across mobile and desktop
Demo booking modal continues to work from all CTAs

file_operations.description: Verify that the auto-rotating hero carousel, why-choose-us section, solutions cards, and metrics display remain intact and functional. Ensure new sections use consistent spacing (section padding, margins), responsive grid/flex layouts, Card components from shadcn/ui where appropriate, and button styling matching existing CTAs. Test that all demo booking modal triggers continue to work. Verify mobile responsiveness for all new content using Tailwind responsive classes.
